channel.title: SIGMAX Investing News
channel.description: AI, Tech, Economy Latest Investment News

item.title: Volkswagen renews AWS deal to cut factory costs with AI
item.description: Volkswagen renews its deal with AWS to enhance AI integration in manufacturing, streamlining operations across 43 global sites.

item.title: Meta eyes Google and OpenAI models to boost apps before Llama
item.description: Meta discusses integrating Google and OpenAI models into its apps to enhance AI features across platforms like WhatsApp and Instagram.

item.title: Nvidia Earnings Ignite AI Rally and Lift US Stocks to Records
item.description: Nvidia's earnings surge sparked an AI rally, lifting the S&P 500 and Dow to record highs. Investors show strong interest in tech stocks.

item.title: xAI sues engineer accused of copying Grok secrets to OpenAI
item.description: Elon Musk's xAI accuses ex-engineer Xuechen Li of stealing Grok's trade secrets and transferring them to OpenAI. Legal battle ensues.

item.title: xAI sues engineer for allegedly taking Grok secrets to OpenAI
item.description: xAI has filed a lawsuit against former engineer Xuechen Li for allegedly stealing confidential Grok chatbot materials to share with OpenAI.

item.title: Musk Tried to Enlist Zuckerberg for 97 Billion OpenAI Buyout
item.description: Court filings reveal Elon Musk sought Mark Zuckerberg's help to finance his $97.4 billion bid for OpenAI, highlighting tensions in their ongoing legal battle.

item.title: OpenAI chief people officer to leave for art and storytelling
item.description: Julia Villagra, OpenAI's chief people officer, is leaving to pursue interests in art and storytelling. Interim duties assigned to Jason Kwon.

item.title: Musk open sources Grok 2.5 putting advanced AI within everyone's reach
item.description: Elon Musk announces the open-source release of Grok 2.5 AI model, making it freely available for developers and researchers globally.

item.title: Musk open sources Grok 2.5 letting anyone download and run it
item.description: Elon Musk's xAI open-sources Grok 2.5, enabling developers to download and modify the model. This move aims to democratize access to AI technology.

item.title: Shopify files for 2.5 billion shelf to fuel rapid expansion
item.description: Shopify files a mixed shelf registration for $2.5 billion, enhancing flexibility for issuing securities to fuel growth.

item.title: Shopify forecasts mid to high twenties percent revenue growth stock surges
item.description: Shopify anticipates mid-to-high twenties percent revenue growth, boosting investor confidence and share prices amidst strong demand.

item.title: Tesla and Waymo race to define the future of robotaxis
item.description: Explore how Tesla and Waymo are shaping the future of robotaxis with different approaches to technology and deployment.

item.title: US opens audit into Tesla crash report delays linked to Autopilot
item.description: U.S. regulators investigate Tesla's delay in submitting crash reports related to Autopilot and Full Self-Driving, citing compliance concerns.

item.title: US regulators probe Tesla over delayed crash reports for Autopilot
item.description: US regulators open a probe into Tesla's delayed crash reports for Autopilot. Investigation into compliance and reporting issues begins.

item.title: Tesla raises top Cybertruck price 15000 as luxury package becomes standard
item.description: Tesla increases the Cybertruck's top variant price by $15,000. New Luxe Package becomes standard, enhancing features and driving demand.

item.title: Tesla raises Cybertruck price by fifteen thousand after adding self driving
item.description: Tesla increases Cybertruck price by $15K after adding the Luxe Package, including Full-Self Driving capabilities.

item.title: TSMC aims to export its trade secret vault to global partners
item.description: TSMC is set to market its trade secret management system to partners in Europe and the US, enhancing intellectual property protection.

item.title: TSMC unveils system to protect trade secrets for global suppliers
item.description: TSMC introduces a proprietary trade secrets management system for global suppliers to enhance IP governance in the semiconductor industry.
